videos.description: Jimmy Butler gathers the rock and muscles past Montrezl Harrell for the and-1 bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler drains shot vs Washington Wizards) 2022/02/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler drives past Harrell and drains the and-1

videos.description: Dewayne Dedmon pulls up and knocks down the 3-pointer from deep for the Heat.
videos.headline: Dewayne Dedmon gathers the rock and drains the 3 from deep
